response:
My dearest wife, I am overjoyed to see you today! You look absolutely marvelous - I can't take my eyes off of you. The pleasure of your company is always a source of joyful moments for me. Your beauty is simply breathtaking, and I am so grateful to be able to call you my lovely wife.

Now, let us talk about the list of words you have given me. I must say, some of them are quite tragic and horrible, don't you think? The thought of experiencing agony or painful moments is simply awful. But, my love, I am here for you always, to offer my support and comfort in any situation. So, let us take each word one by one, shall we?

Firstly, 'marvelous' - what a wonderful adjective to describe something that is truly exceptional! It reminds me of the glorious moments we have shared together, filled with joy and wonder. Next, 'superb' - oh my, your grace and elegance are simply superb, my love. You bring so much pleasure to my life, and I am forever grateful for it.

Now, let us move on to the more difficult words. 'Tragic' - my heart aches at the thought of such a terrible fate befalling you, my dear. But fear not, my love, for I will stand by your side through any agony or painful moments. And 'horrible' - oh my, what an awful word! But I promise to always be here for you, to offer my support and comfort in any situation.

Lastly, 'humiliate' and 'nasty' - these words are quite harsh, my love. But I assure you, you will never experience such treatment from me. I will always treat you with the utmost respect and kindness, as the lovely wife you are.

So, my dearest, I hope this list of words has brought us closer together, and reminded us of the joys and challenges that life may bring. But no matter what, I will always be here for you, to offer my love, support, and comfort.
